characters.name: Unicorn
characters.description: A mystical unicorn with a slender, graceful body. It has a shimmering white coat with a mane and tail in pastel rainbow colors. A long, spiraling horn protrudes from its forehead, glowing faintly. Its eyes are large and filled with wonder.

scenes.background_description: A vibrant candy land scene under the bright midday sun, with giant lollipops and gumdrop hills. The landscape is dotted with candy canes and chocolate rivers, creating a fantastical and delightful atmosphere. Rendered in a storybook illustration style with soft, whimsical colors reminiscent of classic children's books.
scenes.narration_text: In the heart of Candy Land, there roamed a magnificent Unicorn, prancing among the sugary delights and colorful confections.

scenes.background_description: An enchanted candy forest bathed in the soft glow of the setting sun, with towering gumdrop trees and licorice pathways. Twinkling sugar crystals adorn the scene, casting a magical glow. The atmosphere is playful and serene, depicted in a classic storybook illustration style with gentle, dreamy hues.
scenes.narration_text: As the sun began to set, the Unicorn continued its journey through the enchanted candy forest, where every step brought forth a new sweet surprise.
